post.text: It's official: Hillary will be the first woman presidential nominee from a major political party. Watch live as she takes the stage in Brooklyn. hrc.io/1RWDBL6

comment.author: Damien
comment.text: A woman did not have the right to vote in this country until the 19th Amendment was ratified on August 18th, 1920. Hillary Rodham Clinton's candidacy shows just how far we've come in the last 95 years, 9 months, and 21 days. The historical magnitude of this moment cannot be overstated. #ImWithHer

replies.author: William
replies.text: Damien - This truly is a historically moment in the United States of America. I am so proud of Secretary Hillary Clinton.

replies.author: Christiana
replies.text: So Happy to you are the First Lady for president bless you

replies.author: Marina
replies.text: It would also be historic to have the first Jew in office.
